virtual void iview::IDraggable::BeginDrag ( const i2d::CVector2d &  reference) [pure virtual]

Called before dragging is begin.

It set also reference value for dragging position.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, and iview::CInteractiveShapeBase.

virtual void iview::IDraggable::EndDrag ( ) [pure virtual]

Called after dragging.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, and iview::CInteractiveShapeBase.

virtual bool iview::IDraggable::IsDraggable ( ) const [pure virtual]

virtual void iview::IDraggable::SetDragPosition ( const i2d::CVector2d &  position) [pure virtual]

Set new drag position.

It must be enclosed using BeginDrag() and EndDrag() methods.

Implemented in iview::CViewBase, and iview::CInteractiveShapeBase.
